English
When young doctor Edward Newgate arrives at Stonehearst Asylum in search of an
apprenticeship, he is warmly welcomed by superintendent Dr. Lamb and a mesmerizing
woman by the name of Eliza Graves. Edward is intrigued by Lamb's modern methods of
treating the insane until a series of unusual events leads him to make a horrifying
discovery, exposing Lamb's utopia and pushing Edward to the limits of his
conscience. Inspired by a short story from Edgar Allan Poe, Stonehearst Asylum is a
tale in which nobody is who or what they appear to be.
